info.name: Tumblr - Remove Useless Buttons
info.description:
• REMOVES the useless buttons.
  • WORKS on every blog.
  • OPTIONS for every button.
info.additionalInfo:
CHANGELOG
  • Expanded remove "install theme" coverage.
    •
  • Supports the (new) Optica theme.
  • Expanded remove "install theme" button coverage.
  • Improved "remove hit counters" coverage.
  • Total overhaul, due to Tumblr partially breaking the old version.
  • Improved remove "install theme" button coverage.
  • Added basic removal coverage for hit counters.
  • Improved remove "install theme" button coverage.
  • Improved remove "install theme" button coverage.
  • Added ability to remove "notifications" buttons.
